k8s.message: Hi, __USER__, it seems you're seeking help with Kubernetes. Please refer to our documentation <https://kubernetes.io/docs/home/|here> for more information. If this doesn't fully address your concerns, let us know so we can assist you further!

donttagus.message: Hi, __USER__, to help manage our Slack notifications more effectively, please avoid tagging `eng_support` in its channel. Rest assured, all members are active in the channel and will address your queries promptly. For urgent matters, feel free to tag `eng_support` for immediate attention.
